title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Aim√© Jalon
raw_text: Cover Art  Bagadurn    Aime studied at Emile Cohl art school in France and, after graduating, immediately entered video game field. This field allows her a choice of projects she enjoys and the opportunity to work as part of a team. She also tries to keep time for her own drawings. Attracted by all that is graphic and modern, she tries to create rich and original universes... universes where giant nuclear robots, muscle cars and super heroes are kings.
text:
Cover Art
Bagadurn
Aime studied at Emile Cohl art school in France and, after graduating, immediately entered video game field. This field allows her a choice of projects she enjoys and the opportunity to work as part of a team. She also tries to keep time for her own drawings.
Attracted by all that is graphic and modern, she tries to create rich and original universes... universes where giant nuclear robots, muscle cars and super heroes are kings.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Bagadurn by Aime Jalon
